LanguageData.LetterDeathlessDaji: Through Deathless Daji's mandate, the dead rise to fight again. Take care not to let the bloodlust take you...
LanguageData.LetterFarseerFan: As Farseer Fan fortells, the following event will occur on the {0}: {1}.
LanguageData.LetterFarseerFan_Ending1: \n\nNow that you know your fate, are you prepared to meet it?
LanguageData.LetterFarseerFan_Ending2: \n\nWith knowledge of your destiny, can you seize your fate?
LanguageData.LetterFarseerFan_Ending3: \n\nThis is your fortune; make haste to avert a ruinous fate.
LanguageData.LetterFarseerFan_Ending5: \n\nGo, for the now is when your future is made.
LanguageData.KaiyiKarmicDialogueIntro1: This is where destiny is made.\n\nMake an offer; fate does not wait forever.
LanguageData.KaiyiKarmicDialogueIntro2: Here, you may chose your path; it is a rare opportunity to see the future so clearly.\n\nBut foresight alone does not make fate.
LanguageData.KaiyiKarmicDialogueIntro3: From one root there are a thousand branches. Some grow firm and strong; others are only fit for kindling.\n\nThat is fate.
LanguageData.KaiyiKarmicDialogueIntro4: What I offer is the opportunity to seize fate.\n\nI await your terms; make a choice.
LanguageData.KaiyiKarmicDialogueIntro5: All things have a price, fate more so.\n\nSurvive and seize it- that will be your karma.
LanguageData.LetterKaiyiKarmic: Kaiyi has arrived to negotiate. Here is a chance to alter your destiny; make an offer.
LanguageData.LetterKaiyiKarmicDealDonePositive: Gaining {0} karma from this trade, your fate will involve the following:\n
LanguageData.LetterKaiyiKarmicDealDoneNegative: Spending {0} karma in this trade, your fate will involve the following:\n
LanguageData.LetterKaiyiKarmicNoDeal: You have rejected Kaiyi's offer, for now.
